Title: I Can Quit Whenever I Want
Writer: Valerio Attanasio (story), Sydney Sibilia (story), Valerio Attanasio (screenplay), Andrea Garello (screenplay), Sydney Sibilia (screenplay)
Actors: Edoardo Leo, Valeria Solarino, Valerio Aprea, Paolo Calabresi
Plot: A university researcher is fired because of the cuts to university. To earn a living he decides to produce drugs recruiting his former colleagues, who despite their skills are living at the margins of society.
